original_text:
Majestic North
Ambientata in una delle vette più maestose del Canada, Majestic North è la slot Wizard Game con bassa volatilità, un ottimo RTP e simboli trasformabili!
Un luogo incantevole
Nel Canada Occidentale si trova il Majestic Mountains, un vero e proprio paradiso terrestre fatto di fiumi tumultuosi, immense cascate, cime innevate, boschi verdissimi e una fauna diversificata con tante specie protette.
La Wizard Game ha deciso di ambientare qui Majestic North, una slot che colpisce sin da subito per la sua grafica curata. La griglia di gioco, circondata da una cornice di legno, poggia su un ruscello di acqua limpida, attorniata da alti abeti e sorvegliata alle spalle dalle immense cime innevate del Majestic Mountains.
Un ottimo lavoro è stato fatto sui simboli, gli animali sono disegnati così bene da sembrare vivi. Il tasto Start è in realtà una ghiera con cui variare la scommessa, accedere ai giri automatici e al menù.
Caratteristiche di Majestic North
La prima cosa da fare per giocare è decidere la portata della nostra scommessa. Niente panico, perché Majestic North offre un ottimo range di puntata che si adatta ad ogni tipologia di giocatore. Si va da un minimo di 0,20 € a un massimo di 2o0 € per Spin. La griglia ha 5 rulli e 4 righe, quindi ad ogni Spin vedremo atterrare 20 simboli. i modi per vincere sono 1024!
Tra le varie funzioni troviamo il Quick Spin che accelera la rotazione dei rulli e l’Autoplay che invece permette di impostare un numero di giri automatici compreso tra 10 e 500.
La volatilità è bassa, quindi il gioco paga spesso ma sempre cifre non troppo alte. Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è pari al 96,05%.
Come vincere
Come in tutte le slot anche qui siamo di fronte a simboli di basso e alto valore. Appartengono al primo gruppo i reali del poker, quindi dal nove all’asso, mentre nel secondo gruppo troviamo il gufo, l’aquila reale, la renna canadese, il lupo e l’orso Grizzly.
Il simbolo del Canada è lo Scatter e ne occorrono 3, 4 o 5 per ricevere rispettivamente 10, 15 o 20 Free Spins. Durante il gioco bonus è attiva la funzione speciale che trasforma i simboli in orso Grizzly. Accanto alla griglia ci sono 4 icone: il lupo, la renna canadese, l’aquila reale e il gufo con sotto un contatore con 6 posizioni.
Ogni volta che sulle bobine atterra la maschera di legno dell’orso, una posizione sotto gli animali viene riempita. Quando il contatore è completo, vengono aggiunti due Free Spins.
Durante il gioco base, cliccando sul tasto Potenziamento della Funzione, si possono potenziare uno o più simboli.

Domande Frequenti 
Qual è la scommessa minima e quella massima?

La puntata minima è di 0,20 €, la massima è di 200 €.



Posso provare la slot prima di puntare soldi veri?

Certo, sul nostro sito è presente la versione DEMO che permette di testare il gioco in modo del  tutto gratuito e per tutto il tempo necessario.



Dove posso giocare a Majestic North?

Questa slot è disponibile in tutti i casinò online legali, dotati quindi di certificazione AAMS.

raw_translation.response:
Majestic North
Set in one of Canada's most majestic peaks, Majestic North is a low volatility Wizard Game slot with excellent RTP and transformable symbols!
Enchanting location
In western Canada lies Majestic Mountains, a true earthly paradise of turbulent rivers, immense waterfalls, snowy peaks, verdant forests and a diversified fauna with many protected species.
The Wizard Game has decided to set Majestic North here, a slot that immediately stands out for its carefully crafted graphics. The game grid, surrounded by a wooden frame, rests on a stream of clear water, surrounded by tall firs and watched over by the immense snow-covered peaks of Majestic Mountains.
Great work has been done on the symbols, the animals are so well drawn they seem to come to life. The Start button is actually a ring with which to vary the bet, access automatic spins and the menu.
Features of Majestic North
The first thing to do to play is to decide the scope of our bet. No need to panic, because Majestic North offers an excellent range of bets that adapts to every type of player. They range from a minimum of €0.20 to a maximum of €200 per Spin. The grid has 5 reels and 4 rows, so each Spin will see 20 symbols land. The ways to win are 1024!
Among the various functions, we find Quick Spin, which speeds up the rotation of the reels and Autoplay, which allows you to set a number of automatic spins between 10 and 500.
The volatility is low, so the game pays often but always not too high figures. The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.05%.
How to win
As in all slots, we also face low value and high value symbols here. The poker royals belong to the first group, from nine to ace, while in the second group we find the owl, the bald eagle, the Canadian reindeer, the wolf and the Grizzly bear.
The Canadian symbol is the Scatter and 3, 4 or 5 are required to receive 10, 15 or 20 Free Spins, respectively. During the bonus game, the special function that transforms the symbols into Grizzly bears is active. Next to the grid there are 4 icons: the wolf, the Canadian reindeer, the bald eagle, and the owl, each with a counter with 6 positions below.
Every time the wooden mask of the bear lands on the reels, one position underneath the animals is filled. When the counter is complete, two Free Spins are added.
During the base game, by clicking on the Function Enhancement button, you can enhance one or more symbols.

Frequently Asked Questions
What is the minimum and maximum bet?

The minimum bet is €0.20, the maximum is €200.

Can I try the slot before betting real money?

Of course, the DEMO version is available on our website, allowing you to test the game entirely for free and for as long as you need.

Where can I play Majestic North?

This slot is available in all legal online casinos, therefore certified by AAMS.

raw_translation.response:
Welcome to the great Canadian wilderness, where the majestic peaks of Majestic North tower over rugged terrain. Step onto the reels of Wizard Game's low-volatility slot with its excellent RTP and transformable symbols, and experience the wonder of this enchanted place. 

Majestic Mountains is a true terrestrial paradise of raging rivers, thundering waterfalls, snow-capped peaks, lush green forests, and a diverse and well-protected wildlife population. Wizard Game has done an excellent job with Majestic North's visuals, from the detailed symbols that are so lifelike, they seem to leap off the screen, to the wooden frame that surrounds the game grid, which rests against a clear and babbling stream and is surrounded by tall fir trees, with the snow-covered peaks of Majestic Mountains looming in the background. 

To play, choose your bet size from the wide range of options that cater to every type of player - from a minimum of €0.20 to a maximum of €200 per spin. The game grid has five reels and four rows, with 20 symbols landing on each spin, and there are an impressive 1024 ways to win. 

Majestic North offers a variety of features, including Quick Spin, which speeds up the reels, and Autoplay, which allows you to set the number of automatic spins between 10 and 500. With low volatility, the game pays out frequently, although not always large sums. The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.05%, ensuring a fair game for all. 

As with all slots, there are low- and high-value symbols. Lower-paying symbols include poker royals from nine to ace, while higher-paying symbols include a Canadian owl, a bald eagle, a caribou, a wolf, and a grizzly bear. The Canadian symbol is the Scatter, and you'll need three, four, or five to trigger 10, 15, or 20 Free Spins, respectively. During the bonus game, there is a special function that turns symbols into grizzly bears. Four icons are located next to the grid: a wolf, a Canadian caribou, a bald eagle, and a Canadian owl, each with a counter of six positions underneath. 

Whenever the wooden bear mask lands on the reels, a position under the animals is filled. When the counter is complete, two Free Spins are added. During the base game, you can boost symbols by clicking the Function Enhancement button and selecting one or more symbols to enhance. 

Still, have questions? The minimum bet is €0.20, and the maximum is €200. You can try the demo version of Majestic North on our site for free. And you can enjoy this slot in all legal online casinos that are certified by AAMS. Welcome to the wilderness!

Below is a review for the slot game "Majestic North".

Design and Theme

In western Canada lies Majestic Mountains, a true earthly paradise of turbulent rivers, immense waterfalls, snowy peaks, verdant forests and a diversified fauna with many protected species.
The Wizard Game has decided to set Majestic North here, a slot that immediately stands out for its carefully crafted graphics. The game grid, surrounded by a wooden frame, rests on a stream of clear water, surrounded by tall firs and watched over by the immense snow-covered peaks of Majestic Mountains.
Great work has been done on the symbols, the animals are so well drawn they seem to come to life. The Start button is actually a ring with which to vary the bet, access automatic spins and the menu.
Features of Majestic North
The first thing to do to play is to decide the scope of our bet. No need to panic, because Majestic North offers an excellent range of bets that adapts to every type of player. They range from a minimum of €0.20 to a maximum of €200 per Spin. The grid has 5 reels and 4 rows, so each Spin will see 20 symbols land. The ways to win are 1024!
Among the various functions, we find Quick Spin, which speeds up the rotation of the reels and Autoplay, which allows you to set a number of automatic spins between 10 and 500.
The volatility is low, so the game pays often but always not too high figures. The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.05%.
How to win
As in all slots, we also face low value and high value symbols here. The poker royals belong to the first group, from nine to ace, while in the second group we find the owl, the bald eagle, the Canadian reindeer, the wolf and the Grizzly bear.
The Canadian symbol is the Scatter and 3, 4 or 5 are required to receive 10, 15 or 20 Free Spins, respectively. During the bonus game, the special function that transforms the symbols into Grizzly bears is active. Next to the grid there are 4 icons: the wolf, the Canadian reindeer, the bald eagle, and the owl, each with a counter with 6 positions below.
Every time the wooden mask of the bear lands on the reels, one position underneath the animals is filled. When the counter is complete, two Free Spins are added.
During the base game, by clicking on the Function Enhancement button, you can enhance one or more symbols.

What is the minimum and maximum bet?

The minimum bet is €0.20, the maximum is €200.

Can I try the slot before betting real money?

Of course, the DEMO version is available on our website, allowing you to test the game entirely for free and for as long as you need.

Where can I play Majestic North?

This slot is available in all legal online casinos, therefore certified by AAMS.

faq.question: What is the RTP of Majestic North?
faq.answer: The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.05%.

faq.question: What are the ways to win in Majestic North?
What are the special features of Majestic North?
faq.answer: The game offers Quick Spin, which speeds up the rotation of the reels and Autoplay, which allows you to set a number of automatic spins between 10 and 500. During the bonus game, the special function that transforms the symbols into Grizzly bears is active. Every time the wooden mask of the bear lands on the reels, one position underneath the animals is filled. When the counter is complete, two Free Spins are added. During the base game, by clicking on the Function Enhancement button, you can enhance one or more symbols.

faq.question: Which symbols are high value in Majestic North?
faq.answer: The high value symbols are the owl, the bald eagle, the Canadian reindeer, the wolf and the Grizzly bear.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Majestic North".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Majestic North
Set in one of Canada's most majestic peaks, Majestic North is a low volatility Wizard Game slot with excellent RTP and transformable symbols!
Enchanting location
In western Canada lies Majestic Mountains, a true earthly paradise of turbulent rivers, immense waterfalls, snowy peaks, verdant forests and a diversified fauna with many protected species.
The Wizard Game has decided to set Majestic North here, a slot that immediately stands out for its carefully crafted graphics. The game grid, surrounded by a wooden frame, rests on a stream of clear water, surrounded by tall firs and watched over by the immense snow-covered peaks of Majestic Mountains.
Great work has been done on the symbols, the animals are so well drawn they seem to come to life. The Start button is actually a ring with which to vary the bet, access automatic spins and the menu.
Features of Majestic North
The first thing to do to play is to decide the scope of our bet. No need to panic, because Majestic North offers an excellent range of bets that adapts to every type of player. They range from a minimum of €0.20 to a maximum of €200 per Spin. The grid has 5 reels and 4 rows, so each Spin will see 20 symbols land. The ways to win are 1024!
Among the various functions, we find Quick Spin, which speeds up the rotation of the reels and Autoplay, which allows you to set a number of automatic spins between 10 and 500.
The volatility is low, so the game pays often but always not too high figures. The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.05%.
How to win
As in all slots, we also face low value and high value symbols here. The poker royals belong to the first group, from nine to ace, while in the second group we find the owl, the bald eagle, the Canadian reindeer, the wolf and the Grizzly bear.
The Canadian symbol is the Scatter and 3, 4 or 5 are required to receive 10, 15 or 20 Free Spins, respectively. During the bonus game, the special function that transforms the symbols into Grizzly bears is active. Next to the grid there are 4 icons: the wolf, the Canadian reindeer, the bald eagle, and the owl, each with a counter with 6 positions below.
Every time the wooden mask of the bear lands on the reels, one position underneath the animals is filled. When the counter is complete, two Free Spins are added.
During the base game, by clicking on the Function Enhancement button, you can enhance one or more symbols.

Frequently Asked Questions
What is the minimum and maximum bet?

The minimum bet is €0.20, the maximum is €200.

Can I try the slot before betting real money?

Of course, the DEMO version is available on our website, allowing you to test the game entirely for free and for as long as you need.

Where can I play Majestic North?

This slot is available in all legal online casinos, therefore certified by AAMS.

dalle-prompt.response: Create a feature image for the game "Majestic North" that captures the essence of the game's setting and incorporates a happy Maya warrior with glasses. The image should be in cartoon style and feature the Maya warrior as the main focus, surrounded by the beautiful natural elements of the Majestic Mountains. The warrior should be depicted as joyful and excitable, clearly enjoying the wonders around him. The image should also include the game's title and possibly other symbols such as animals from the game or the wooden mask of the bear.
